template.comment: (Enter /usr/local/Gaussian/g03/l1110.exe) Forming Gx(P) for the SCF density, NAtomX= 15. Integral derivatives from FoFDir, PRISM(SPDF). MinBra= 0 MaxBra= 2 Meth= 1. IRaf= 0 NMat= 1 IRICut= 1 DoRegI=T DoRafI=F ISym2E= 0 JSym2E=0. FoFDir/FoFCou used for L=0 through L=2.
